description: Try our easy to follow Rudolph Choc-Chip Cookies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Rudolph Choc-Chip Cookies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 15 minutes. Remove from oven & gently press in ALLEN'S JAFFAS into warm cookies to form Rudolph's nose.Use remaining NESTLÉ SWEETENED CONDENSED MILK to make a yummy caramel topping for Ice cream!
